squidpony.squidgrid.gui

Class SGTextAndImagePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLayeredPane
            • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.SPanel
              • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.SGTextPanel
                • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.SGTextAndImagePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SGTextAndImagePanel
extends SGTextPanel
    Displays both text and pre-loaded images in a grid pattern. In order to ensure both the images and text are the same size, initialize this panel by cell dimension.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • SGTextAndImagePanel

        public SGTextAndImagePanel()
        Empty constructor. An initialization method must be used before this panel is ready to be used.

      • SGTextAndImagePanel

        public SGTextAndImagePanel(int cellWidth,
                   int cellHeight,
                   int panelWidth,
                   int panelHeight,
                   java.awt.Font font)
        Builds a new panel with the desired traits. The size of the font will be used unless it's too large to fit, in which case it will be stepped down until the characters fit.
        Parameters:
        cellWidth - cell width in pixels.
        cellHeight - cell height in pixels.
        panelWidth - number of cells vertically..
        panelHeight - number of cells horizontally.
        font -

    • Method Detail

      • placeImage

        public void placeImage(int x,
              int y,
              java.lang.String key)
        Places the image associated with the provided key at the given coordinates. If the key does not have an associated image, the factory's default null image is used.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        key -

      • placeImage

        public void placeImage(int x,
              int y,
              java.lang.String key,
              java.awt.Color background)
        Places the image associated with the provided key at the given coordinates. If the key does not have an associated image, the factory's default null image is used. The background will be set to the provided Color, but will only show up if the keyed image has transparency.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        key -
        background -

      • initialize

        public void initialize(int cellWidth,
              int cellHeight,
              int panelWidth,
              int panelHeight,
              java.awt.Font font)
        Initializes the component with the supplied values. The cells will be set to the desired width and height and if the size of the font is too large, it will be shrunk until everything fits.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class SGTextPanel
        Parameters:
        cellWidth - in pixels
        cellHeight - in pixels
        panelWidth - in cells
        panelHeight - in cells
        font -

      • initialize

        public void initialize(int panelWidth,
              int panelHeight,
              java.awt.Font font)
        Initializes the component with the supplied number of rows and columns. The size of the display will be adjusted to match the requested font size as closely as possible.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class SGTextPanel
        Parameters:

        panelHeight - in cells
